actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend from 60 days to 120 days the period between notice and effective date for certain reductions and discontinuations of Department of Veterans Affairs monetary benefits.

summary.text: Amends Federal veterans' benefits provisions to extend from 60 to 120 days the period between notice and effective date for certain reductions of monetary benefits paid to veterans by the Department of Veterans Affairs.

titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend from 60 days to 120 days the period between notice and effective date for certain reductions and discontinuations of Department of Veterans Affairs monetary benefits.
